H0.text: What successful, no-frills airline is headquartered at Love Field in Dallas, and is one of the few that doesn't charge a baggage handling fee. Spirit Airlines

H1.text: What successful, no-frills airline is headquartered at Love Field in Dallas, and is one of the few that doesn't charge a baggage handling fee. Frontier Airlines

H2.text: What successful, no-frills airline is headquartered at Love Field in Dallas, and is one of the few that doesn't charge a baggage handling fee. Allegiant Air

H3.text: What successful, no-frills airline is headquartered at Love Field in Dallas, and is one of the few that doesn't charge a baggage handling fee. SWABIZ

A4.text: Spirit Airlines, Inc. is an American ultra low-cost airline headquartered in Dania Beach, Florida, in the Miami metropolitan area.

A5.text: Spirit Airlines charges additional fees for large carry-on or checked bags.

A6.text: To make up for revenue lost in decreased ticket prices, the airline may charge extra fees, such as for carry-on baggage.
